task.title: Editing XML processing instructions
task.shortdesc: If you have instructions you want to pass along to an application using an XML document, you can use a processing instruction.

context.p: The following instructions were written for the Resource perspective, but they will also work in many other perspectives.
To edit a processing instruction, follow these steps:

step.cmd: In the Design view of the XML editor, right-click your processing instruction, and click Edit Processing Instruction.
The Target field is used to identify the application the instructions belongs to.
The Data field contains the instructions.

taskbody.postreq: To create a new processing instruction, right-click in the Design view, and click Add Child, Add Before or Add After, then click Add Processing Instruction.
